name: places/ChIJO8Bn7eRYwokRKKnW20580ps
formattedAddress: 155 E 55th St #206, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 155 E 55th St #206, New York, NY 10022-4051, USA

originalText.text: Doctor Ayoubi has treated my entire family for the past 6+ years because everyone at the office is reliable, professional, and kind. Ayoubi goes above and beyond when taking care of his patients. He remembers the details of our lives and is always open to friendly conversation. He provides an extensive examination and let’s you know about foreseeable dental issues so that you can work with him on a plan to take control of your health and avoid unnecessary last minute treatments and costs. I could not imagine seeing anyone else who would provide the same kindness and care every single visit.

originalText.text:
Dr. Ayoubi has been my dentist for the last two years, and I only have good things to say about him and his staff.

There is hardly any wait time when you arrive on time, your appointment time is respected. Dr Imad takes time to explain any dental problem I have had, and the procedure required to address it. He is very friendly to his patients and always keeps the mood light when you visit him

Billing/insurance has never been a problem - the front desk staff always explains the insurance coverage (and your responsibility) upfront.

I would definitely recommend Dental Pyramids

originalText.text: This is an amazing office! Everyone is so professional and polite, with a good sense of humor. Dr Ayoubi is a wonderful person and a great dentist. He gives his patients the best treatment care! 100% satisfied from this office and love to chat with them.

text.text: This is an amazing office! Everyone is so professional and polite, with a good sense of humor. Dr Ayoubi is a wonderful person and a great dentist. He gives his patients the best treatment care! 100% satisfied from this office and love to chat with them.

originalText.text:
I made an appointment over the phone with Dr. Ayubi two weeks ago. I explained my insurance to him, and he said he can see me at 11:00 AM on that day.

I received the confirmation message from them a few days before the appointment.

I went to the office on time, but I started feeling a little skeptical (gut feeling). The building is dark and old...

And the receptionist started with "we do not have an appointment with your name" And the earliest day that they can see me is TWO MONTH later!!!!

I took paid time off for this appointment, and it's a waste of my time!!!!

I would not recommend this dental office to anyone.

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Ayoubi for nearly 20 years and he has done excellent work.  He always explains what the problem is and we develop a treatment plan together. When my insurance plan changed, he made a special effort to ensure I would still be covered.  He helped fix the disasters created by my previous dentist.  His equipment is state-of-the-art, and keeps up with the latest developments in the field.  I have been very pleased with his service.
